ITProgressBar =============
`ITProgressBar` is a high-performance progress bar control for Mac OS X. Itâ€™s implemented using Core Animation, making it lighning-fast.
![](./demo1.png) ![](./demo2.png) ![](./demo3.png)
### Documentation
Check out the demo-project and the `ITProgressBar.h` file to learn more about the control.
Lazy-ass you say? You might just be right.
